Text: Lenox title sponsorshipMr Skilling We are selling the title sponsorship of Atlantas Lenox Square the most prestigious shopping mall in the South Nearly million people visit Leno x annually more than attends the games of a Major League Baseball team in a decade This is an outstanding deal priced below naming rights of stadium and arena deals done recently Simon Property Group the leader in the shopping mall industry owns and operates Lenox and this is their first naming rights deal Do you have interest If so please contact me at your earliest convenience Sincerely Kevin L Sullivan Vice President HopeBeckham Inc Corporate Square Suite Atlanta Georgia x
